colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA'I MJUG TU 'DON RGYU'I 'DOD GSOL SMON LAM 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES DKA' BCU SMRA BA BLO BZANG RIN CHEN DANG, CHOS MDZOD 'JAM DBYANGS DBANG PHYUG DANG, SKYOR DPON RAB 'BYAMS BLO BZANG SBYIN PA, DRUNG YIG PA DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS PHUN TSOGS, DGE SLONG @004B NAM MKHA' DON GRUB RNAMS KYIS NAN TAN CHEN POS GSOL BA BTAB PA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG ZHVA SER COD PAn 'DZIN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO YE SHES BRTZON 'GRUS GRAGS PA'I SDES CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO DRUNG YIG DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS PHUN TSOGS SO,, ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
